text: 7.14: Stt 45.9-10; 45.17-18; 46.27Zosep wo bun mbe suaŋgiap, mbaram zumgum won ndia Zekop ga nzuav ŋkɨɨa muuŋgi. Ana ana nzuav ŋkɨɨa muuŋgim, ana mbaram Idzɨvan ndav, mbaram za won tari gum mben muuiŋ gum bigi, ana za mben kov Idzɨvan ndagi. Ana ndav kov ndagi gumgi gu mbigir vhɨrve khare, 75.
